item.title: See Caitlin Clark play: How to watch today's Iowa vs. Colorado women's NCAA March Madness Sweet 16 game
item.description: Caitlin Clark is headed to the Sweet 16. Find out when and how to watch the Iowa Hawkeyes' March Madness game today.

item.title: How to watch today's Illinois vs. UConn men's NCAA March Madness Elite 8 game: Livestream options, more
item.description: Track UConn and Illinois' Elite 8 NCAA March Madness game with everything you need to know to watch today's game.

item.title: See Angel Reese play: How to watch today's LSU vs. UCLA women's NCAA March Madness Sweet 16 game
item.description: Saturday plans locked in: Find out how and when to watch the LSU vs. UCLA women's March Madness Sweet 16 showdown.

item.title: Largest crane on Eastern Seaboard arrives at Key Bridge collapse site
item.description: A complicated cleanup operation is underway in Baltimore as crews begin removing tons of wreckage from what used to be the Francis Scott Key Bridge. CBS News senior transportation correspondent Kris Van Cleave has the details.

item.title: Israeli airstrikes kill 44 people in Syria, war monitor says
item.description: A U.K. war monitor says Israeli airstrikes killed 44 people near the Syrian city of Aleppo early Friday. Human rights groups have called it the deadliest attack in Syria in years. CBS News national security contributor Sam Vinograd joins with analysis.

item.title: Friend of Evan Gershkovich discusses effort to get him home
item.description: Friday marks one year since Russian authorities arrested Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, an action the State Department calls a "wrongful detention." Jeremy Berke, a close friend of Gershkovich, joins CBS News to discuss what the past year has been like, and the efforts to bring the imprisoned journalist home.

item.title: Massive crane barge arrives in Baltimore for Key Bridge collapse cleanup
item.description: A complex cleanup operation is underway to remove the Dali cargo ship and piled up wreckage of the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore. One of the largest crane barges in the U.S. has now arrived on site and more vital equipment is on its way. Kris Van Cleave has an up-close look.

item.title: A look at impact protection for bridges after Key Bridge collapse
item.description: Could anything have been done to prevent the collapse of the Francis Scott Key Bridge? Investigators say the bridge did have some kind of impact protection, but CBS News has learned that a majority of U.S. bridges do not. Stephen Stock has more.

item.title: Remembering trailblazing actor Louis Gossett Jr.
item.description: Hollywood is mourning the death of Louis Gossett Jr., who died Friday at the age of 87. Gossett was the first Black man to win an Oscar for a supporting role in 1983 for the film "An Officer and a Gentleman." Michelle Miller looks back on his life and career.

item.title: Foreign adversaries may be involved in Havana Syndrome, sources say
item.description: For the first time, sources tell "60 Minutes" they have evidence that a U.S. adversary may be involved in attacks on Americans linked to a mysterious condition known as Havana Syndrome. Scott Pelley reports.

item.title: United Airlines expecting busiest spring break on record
item.description: Easter weekend and spring break travel are colliding this year, with the Transportation Security Administration screening nearly 2.8 million people on Thursday. That's nearly 290,000 more than the same day in 2023. CBS News correspondent Carter Evans reports from Los Angeles.

item.title: Torrential rain may snarl Easter travel in California
item.description: Travel delays could be in store for those flying out West, with 20 million people in California in the path of torrential rains and flash flooding this weekend from a rare late season storm. The Weather Channel meteorologist Mike Bettes has details.

item.title: Millions expected to hit the road for Easter holiday
item.description: Millions of Americans are hitting the roads and the airports this holiday weekend, with both Easter and Spring Break travel in full swing. Carter Evans checks in from LAX.

item.title: "CBS Evening News" headlines for Friday, March 29, 2024
item.description: Here's a look at the top stories making headlines on the "CBS Evening News" anchored by Robert Costa.

item.title: 3/29: CBS Evening News
item.description: Massive crane barge arrives in Baltimore for Key Bridge collapse cleanup; Chicago honors Vietnam veterans with restored memorial

item.title: Friends of man with ALS fix up his old Mustang in heartwarming surprise
item.description: Steve Hartman goes "On the Road" with a story about how old friends - and an old car - gave one man a new lease on life.

item.title: Chicago honors Vietnam veterans with restored memorial
item.description: Chicago has unveiled a restored memorial for Vietnam veterans in the heart of downtown. First dedicated in 2005, the memorial had faded after years of neglect and harsh winters.

item.title: What inspired Beyoncé's new album "Cowboy Carter"?
item.description: Beyoncé released her highly anticipated album "Cowboy Carter" on Friday, featuring 27 tracks and a genre-bending sound that pays tribute to country music's Black origins. Lamar Dawson, radio host and pop culture expert, joins CBS News to discuss the new album.

item.title: 3/29: CBS News Weekender
item.description: Lana Zak reports on the massive cleanup operation at the Baltimore bridge collapse, Evan Gershkovich reaching one year jailed in Russia, and the impact of Beyonce's new album on country music.

item.title: Dolly Parton wished for Beyoncé to cover "Jolene" years ago
item.description: In a 2022 interview on The Daily Show, Dolly Parton said having Beyoncé record a version of "Jolene" would be "killer."

item.title: Majority of U.S. bridges lack impact protection. Will anything change?
item.description: There are 4,207 bridges in the U.S. that allow ships to pass under them. Of those, only 36% are described as having functional pier protection.

item.title: The best desktop computers in 2024 for every type of family
item.description: Our in-house consumer tech experts have compiled this roundup of the best desktop PCs currently available to Windows and MacOS users.

item.title: 10 ways to upgrade your living room with picks from Amazon, West Elm and more
item.description: We found the best furniture and decorative items to level up your living room for spring.

item.title: American Airlines changes its policy for bringing pets on flights
item.description: Under the carrier's old policy, pets were counted as carry-ons despite a steep charge passengers pay to bring animals into the cabin.

item.title: What consumers should know about health supplement linked to 5 deaths
item.description: Products containing red yeast rice and meant to lower cholesterol are also sold in the U.S., but what they contain can be murky.

item.title: Solar eclipse expected to boost local economies as travelers pay a premium
item.description: On April 8, a total eclipse will be visible from Texas to New England. If you're thinking of traveling to one of the places in the path of totality, get ready for crowds and high prices. CBS News' Robbie Owens reports.

item.title: California set to hike wages for fast-food workers to $20 per hour
item.description: Starting April 1, the minimum wage for most fast-food workers in California will jump to $20 an hour — the highest in the U.S.

item.title: Trump asks appeals court to review ruling letting Willis stay on Georgia case
item.description: Former President Donald Trump and other defendants have submitted an application to appeal a ruling allowing Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis to remain on the case.

item.title: Fulton County DA Fani Willis plans to take a lead role in trying Trump case
item.description: Two weeks after Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis survived a bid​ by defense lawyers to have her disqualified from the Georgia election interference case​, she has all but taken over the case personally,

item.title: Save 23% on the rarely discounted Cuisinart bread maker on Amazon
item.description: We've been tracking this product for months and it's finally on sale at Amazon.
